channel.title: Any Idea how to fix this?
channel.description:
Okay so I made the .Jar file for my server. Works perfectly for me . But when I send it out to my friends. It will Download the cache , but as it goes to actually load the game. It stops at like 40% and says requesting 2D graphics. Was there something I'm missing in my folder with all the CLASS files? Or ? What's going on.
thanks guys.

item.title: Any Idea how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Dougyb Dougyb
item.description:
@Dougyb wrote:

I already have a directory for the cache. It’s just I think I may be missing something that deals with 2D Graphics. I honestly don’t know. But one thing I do know. Is that it downloads the cache and it goes to the C:/ .

EDIT : Still in need of help . Would much appreciate if anyone could over teamviewer.

Read full topic
item.source: Any Idea how to fix this?

item.title: Any Idea how to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @RuneEden RuneEden
item.description:
@RuneEden wrote:

[quote=“Dougyb, post:5, topic:454335”]No I haven’t tried to make a webclient. I just tried to .Jar it. I’ve followed many guides. They all say to put the input directory as your folder with all the CLASS Files in it. So I did and it worked just fine for me. But when I sent it to friends it gave me the same problem. I just don’t know if i’m missing something that has anything to do with 2d graphics?

If it is my cache packed incorrectly? How would I fix that.

Note: I’m fairly new to all this programming/ coding stuff. But I am learning.

Thanks[/quote]

Well if you are going to JAR a file you need to make a separate directory for the cache files (C Drive). It is the exact same thing as creating a webclient, you just don’t put it on the website. You would upload it and allow others to download it. Follow this webclient tutorial here > http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html

Read full topic

@Dougyb wrote:

No I haven’t tried to make a webclient. I just tried to .Jar it. I’ve followed many guides. They all say to put the input directory as your folder with all the CLASS Files in it. So I did and it worked just fine for me. But when I sent it to friends it gave me the same problem. I just don’t know if i’m missing something that has anything to do with 2d graphics?

If it is my cache packed incorrectly? How would I fix that.

Note: I’m fairly new to all this programming/ coding stuff. But I am learning.

Thanks

[quote=“Dougyb, post:3, topic:454335”]Alright I’m back online and I need some help. Anyone up for it? :\

Thanks[/quote]

Did you follow some type of tutorial to turn this into a webclient? If so you might have packed the cache wrong.
